conversation.speaker: Kabir
conversation.text: Arre welcome back folks! [laughs] Kabir here—ajkal sab Jio ke baare mein baat karte, matlab 50.6 crore users? Phew, sahi mein? [sighs]

conversation.speaker: Ananya
conversation.text: umm... Achcha, Jio toh game changer tha—2016 public launch ne sabko shock kar diya, free data ka zamana, bhai. [laughs] Hahaha

conversation.speaker: Kabir
conversation.text: Haan, aur 22 telecom circles pe coverage, 4G se 5G tak, 6G ka bhi promise—matlab future ready ya overhyped? Sahi mein?

conversation.speaker: Ananya
conversation.text: Main bolungi future ready—Navi Mumbai se start karke poora India cover kar liya, 506 million subscribers, bro, that's huge. [phew]

conversation.speaker: Kabir
conversation.text: Par competition bhi tight hai, aur quality matters—network down hua toh sab tweet karte. [laughs]

conversation.speaker: Ananya
conversation.text: Sach, aur innovations chalte rahenge—data plans, devices, aur 5G rollouts—Jio ka pace unstoppable lagta. umm... excited! [laughs]
